name: Turkey Butter Rub
steps: Render the fat out of the Bacon strips in the oven, and save the fat
Clarify Butter by heating it and skimming/discarding the solids
Once well clarified, keep on heat and add Thyme and Sage
Let fry for two minutes, then add Olive Oil and Rendered Bacon Fat
Stir until consistent, and stir it over heat for another minute
Take off the heat and let sit for a half hour
After letting sit, give one last stir and either use or refrigerate
comments: This recipe has a byproduct of 8 cooked bacon strips - save it for later!
